00031     struct divide_by_zero
00032 #if ! defined (BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS) && ! defined (BOOST_UBLAS_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
00033         // Inherit from standard exceptions as requested during review.
00034         : public std::runtime_error 
00035         {
00036         explicit divide_by_zero (const char *s = "divide by zero") :
00037             std::runtime_error (s) {}
00038         void raise () {
00039             throw *this;
00040         }
00041 #else
00042     {
00043         divide_by_zero ()
00044             {}
00045         explicit divide_by_zero (const char *)
00046             {}
00047         void raise () {
00048             std::abort ();
00049         }
00050 #endif
00051     };

00207 #if BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_ENABLE
00208 // Macros are equivilent to 
00209 //    template<class E>
00210 //    BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00211 //    void check (bool expression, const E &e) {
00212 //        if (! expression)
00213 //            e.raise ();
00214 //    }
00215 //    template<class E>
00216 //    BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00217 //    void check_ex (bool expression, const char *file, int line, const E &e) {
00218 //        if (! expression)
00219 //            e.raise ();
00220 //    }
00221 #ifndef BOOST_UBLAS_NO_STD_CERR
00222 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_FALSE(e) \
00223     std::cerr << "Check failed in file " << __FILE__ << " at line " << __LINE__ << ":" << std::endl; \
00224     e.raise ();
00225 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK(expression, e) \
00226     if (! (expression)) { \
00227         std::cerr << "Check failed in file " << __FILE__ << " at line " << __LINE__ << ":" << std::endl; \
00228         std::cerr << #expression << std::endl; \
00229         e.raise (); \
00230     }
00231 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_EX(expression, file, line, e) \
00232     if (! (expression)) { \
00233         std::cerr << "Check failed in file " << (file) << " at line " << (line) << ":" << std::endl; \
00234         std::cerr << #expression << std::endl; \
00235         e.raise (); \
00236     }
00237 #else
00238 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_FALSE(e) \
00239     e.raise ();
00240 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK(expression, e) \
00241     if (! (expression)) { \
00242         e.raise (); \
00243     }
00244 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_EX(expression, file, line, e) \
00245     if (! (expression)) { \
00246         e.raise (); \
00247     }
00248 #endif
00249 #else
00250 // Macros are equivilent to 
00251 //    template<class E>
00252 //    BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00253 //    void check (bool expression, const E &e) {}
00254 //    template<class E>
00255 //    BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00256 //    void check_ex (bool expression, const char *file, int line, const E &e) {}
00257 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_FALSE(e)
00258 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK(expression, e)
00259 #define BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_EX(expression, file, line, e)
00260 #endif
00261 
00262 
00263 #ifndef BOOST_UBLAS_USE_FAST_SAME
00264 // Macro is equivilent to 
00265 //    template<class T>
00266 //    BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00267 //    const T &same_impl (const T &size1, const T &size2) {
00268 //        BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK (size1 == size2, bad_argument ());
00269 //        return (std::min) (size1, size2);
00270 //    }
00271 // #define BOOST_UBLAS_SAME(size1, size2) same_impl ((size1), (size2))
00272      // need two types here because different containers can have
00273      // different size_types (especially sparse types)
00274     template<class T1, class T2>
00275     BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00276     // Kresimir Fresl and Dan Muller reported problems with COMO.
00277     // We better change the signature instead of libcomo ;-)
00278     // const T &same_impl_ex (const T &size1, const T &size2, const char *file, int line) {
00279     T1 same_impl_ex (const T1 &size1, const T2 &size2, const char *file, int line) {
00280         BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_EX (size1 == size2, file, line, bad_argument ());
00281         return (size1 < size2)?(size1):(size2);
00282     }
00283     template<class T>
00284     BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00285     T same_impl_ex (const T &size1, const T &size2, const char *file, int line) {
00286         BOOST_UBLAS_CHECK_EX (size1 == size2, file, line, bad_argument ());
00287         return (std::min) (size1, size2);
00288     }
00289 #define BOOST_UBLAS_SAME(size1, size2) same_impl_ex ((size1), (size2), __FILE__, __LINE__)
00290 #else
00291 // Macros are equivilent to 
00292 //    template<class T>
00293 //    BOOST_UBLAS_INLINE
00294 //    const T &same_impl (const T &size1, const T &size2) {
00295 //        return size1;
00296 //    }
00297 // #define BOOST_UBLAS_SAME(size1, size2) same_impl ((size1), (size2))
00298 #define BOOST_UBLAS_SAME(size1, size2) (size1)
00299 #endif
00300
